attributes.action: force LOCOG to change the London 2012 logo & investigate the cost incurred
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Its our belief is the London 2012 logo will be seen as a worldwide embarrassment to this country should it be left as is. Therefore, it should be changed immediately with as little cost to the tax payer as possible. Also, an investigation is held to ascertain the cost of the initial design (reported to be £400,000) and its potential mis-management.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
